txb_outgoing_mail_server.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"SMTPRelayServerName") and contains(@id,"SMTP") and contains(@id,"sysemailparameters") and  1]

txb_smtp_port_number.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"SMTPPortNumber") and contains(@id,"SMTP") and contains(@id,"sysemailparameters") and  1]

chk_ssl_tls_required.xpath: //span[contains(@id,"toggle") and contains(@id,"SSLRequired") and contains(@id,"SMTP") and contains(@id,"sysemailparameters") and  1]

txb_environment_email_subject.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"SaeNonProdEmailSubjectPrefix") and contains(@id,"SysEmailParameters") and contains(@id,"sysemailparameters") and  1]

chk_authentication_required.xpath: //span[contains(@id,"toggle") and contains(@id,"AuthenticationEnabled") and contains(@id,"SMTP") and contains(@id,"sysemailparameters") and  1]

txb_username.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"SMTPUserName") and contains(@id,"SMTP") and contains(@id,"sysemailparameters") and  1]

txb_password.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"Password") and contains(@id,"SMTP") and contains(@id,"sysemailparameters") and  1]
